name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ModifyGPT  - Customize Web Pages With ChatGPT

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ModifyGPT allows you to modify web pages just the way you like with simple prompts, powered by ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ModifyGPT is a Chrome extension that allows you to modify elements of web pages using simple prompts.

Whether you want to add a new column to a table, change the style of an element, or transform webpage content in other ways, ModifyGPT makes it possible.

ModifyGPT makes it possible. Utilizing the powerful capabilities of OpenAI's ChatGPT, you can interactively customize your web browsing experience to suit your needs.

From simple tasks like changing font styles to more complex modifications like restructuring page layouts, ModifyGPT can help you make the web your own. This extension goes beyond standard personalization features, giving you AI-powered control over the websites you visit.

Supported Languages:
ModifyGPT supports all languages supported by ChatGPT.

Disclaimer:
ModifyGPT is designed to assist with web page customization, but it may not perfectly execute every possible modification. For complex tasks or those requiring professional expertise, additional tools or professional guidance may be needed.
